title: Masuratori
ingredients: 1 lingurita rasa de ==: apa = 5gr, faina = 6gr, gris = 7gr, zahar = 10gr, orez = 9gr, unt = 10gr, pesmet = 5gr, lapte = 5gr, ulei = 3.5gr
1 pahar obisnuit de ==: faina= 125gr,  zahar tos = 200gr, zahar praf = 180gr, sare = 220gr, orez = 230gr, gris = 200gr, nuci macinate = 200gr, lapte = 250gr, smantana = 250gr

title: Dintii negresei + Eclere
ingredients: Dintii negresei: 6 galbenusuri, 300gr zahar,  120gr margarina, 1/2 plic cacao, rom, bicarbonat, 300gr faina, 300gr lapte, gem, 6 ablusuri, 250/300gr zahar
Eclere: 200gr margarina, 250gr apa, 250gr faina, 8 oua, putina sare
Eclere crema: 1/2l lapte, vanilie, 4 oua, 175gr zahar, 80gr faina

title: Prajitura cu Vanilie + Smerr - Chifle
ingredients: Prajitura cu Vanilie: 300gr faina; 100gr margarina, 2 oua, 8lg zahar, bicarbonat, lapte cat cuprinde
crema: 400ml lapte, 3 lg faina, 250gr zahar, 1 pachet unt si vanilie
Smerr - Chifle: 600gr untura, 900gr faina, 1 ou, 2 galbenusuri, sare, 200ml apa cu 4 lg otet, 3 lg smantana, bicarbonat
gem pentru umplut:

alt: Foi negre + Foi cu miere + Prajitura cu spuma
title: Foi negre + Foi cu miere + Prajitura cu spuma
ingredients: Foi negre: 300gr faina, 1 ou, 100gr margarina, 100gr zahar, 3 lg cacao, bicarbonat, 7 lg lapte
Foi negre crema: 1/2 l lapte, 4 lg faina, 250gr unt, 200gr zahar praf si vanilie
Foi cu miere: 1 ou, 2 galbenusuri, 5lg lapte, 4lg ulei, 2lg miere, 250gr zahar, bicarbonat,450gr faina, coaja rasa lamaie
Foi cu miere crema: 250ml lapte, 150gr zahar, 2lg faina, 250gr unt si vanilie
Prajitura cu spuma: 6 galbenusuri, 180gr margarina, 300gr zahar, 300gr ulei, 2 lg rase cacao. bicarbonat, 300gr faina, 6 albusuri batute, 8 lg zahar
Prajitura cu spuma crema: 200gr unt, 100gr zahar praf, 3 lg cacao

title: Budapesta
ingredients: Budapesta blat1: 6 oua, 7 lg zahar, 3 lg apa, 7 lg faina
Budapesta blat2: 6 albusuri, 250gr nuca macinata, 250gr zahar, 2lg faina si bicarbonat
Budapesta crema: 6 galbenusuri, 250gr zahar, 2/3lg cacao, 4/5lg cafea lichida, 1 pachet unt
Budapesta glazura: 5 lg zahar, 2 lg lapte, 50gr margarina, cacao

title: Prajitura chinezeasca + Bombe + Tort simplu
ingredients: Prajitura chinezeasca: 200gr margarina, 200gr zahar, 150gr nuci, coaja lamaie, 6 albusuri, 100gr faina, bicarbonat.
Prajitura chinezeasca crema: 5 galbenusuri, 150gr zahar, 2/3 lg lapte, vanilie, 1 pachet unt, glazura ciocolata
Bombe: biscuiti sau capete de la alte prajituri, zahar praf, cacao, rom , stafide, unt, lapte caldut, nuca cocs, 1/2 oua, visine, cirese, almendre, cacao
Tort simplu blat: 5 oua, 7 lg zahar, 3 lg apa, 7 lg fainaa(sau 6 si 1 lg cacao)
Tort simplu crema1: 4 oua, 1/3 cana zahar 2 lg cacao, 1 pachet unt
Tort simplu crema2: 1pachet unt, 1 cana zahar praf, 1 cana nuca fiarta, 1/2 cana lapte, cacao, rom

title: Ileana + Dobos
ingredients: Ileana blat: 10 albusuri, 300gr zahar, 300gr nuca macinata, bicarbonat, 2 lg faina
Ileana crema: 10 galbenusuri, 3 lg lapte, 9 lg zahar, 1 pachet unt, vanilie
Dobos foi: 10 oua, 10lg zahar, 9 lg faina
Dobos crema: 6 oua, 18lg zahar, cacao, 350gr unt
Dobos caramel: 300gr zahar, 100ml apa, 3lg otet, 30gr unt

title: Check simplu + Pogacele + Gelu
ingredients: Check simplu: 6 galbenusuri, 1 cana zahar, 100ml apa calduta, 100gr ulei, bicarbonat, coaja lamaie, 300gr faina, 6 albusuri, cacao
Pogacele: 500gr faina, 400gr jumari macinate, 2 galbenusuri, 30gr drojdie crescuta, bicarbonat stins, 2lg apa cu otet, sare, 100gr smantana, ou pt uns, chimen
Gelu: 300gr faina, 120gr margarina, 100gr zahar, bicarbonat, 1 ou, 3lg lapte, 1lg smantana
Gelu crema: 1/2 l lapte, 3lg faina, 1 pachet unt, 250gr zahar praf, vanilie
Gelu glazura: 5lg zahar, 3lg apa, cacao, 1lg unt

title: Petre Roman
ingredients: Petre Roman foi: 9 albusuri, 18lg zahar, 9 galbenusuri, 1 lg apa, 9lg faina, 9lg nuca macinata, bicarbonat
Petre Roman crema 1: 1 cana zahar, putin unt
Petre Roman crema 2: 3 oua, 150gr zahar, 4lg faina, 1/2 l lapte, 1 pachet unt
Petre Roman glazura: 3 albusuri, 300gr zahar

title: Katy + Lamaita
ingredients: Katy foi: 180gr margarina, 150gr zahar, 500gr faina, 2 galbenusuri, 200ml lapte, bicarbonat
Katy crema: 2-3lg gem, 1lg cacao, 1 pachet unt, rom, putin lapte caldut
Katy glazura: 2 albusuri, 200gr zahar
Lamaita foi: 300gr faina, 100gr unt, 80gr zahar, 1 ou, 1 lg-ita amoniac dizolvat cu zeama lamaie sau otet
Lamaita crema: 1 cana lapte, 2 lg faina, 1 pachet unt, 200gr zahar praf, zeama de la o lamaie, frisca pentru ornat

title: Fursecuri + Tort foarte fin
ingredients: Fursecuri: 300gr unt, 300gr faina, 8 galbenusuri, 250gr zahar praf
Fursecuri crema: 200gr unt, 200gr zahar praf, cacao, nuca macinata
Tort foarte fin blat: 12 oua, 12 linguri zahar, 2 linguri faina, 50gr cacao, rom
Tort foarte fin crema: 10 linguri zahar, 200ml lapte, 150gr cacao, 400gr unt, rom

title: Tort Trunchi de copac
ingredients: Tort Trunchi de copac blat: 8 oua, 7lg zahar, 1 lg faina, 150gr nuca macinata, bicarbonat
Tort Trunchi de copac crema: 250gr unt, 100gr nuci, 4 oua, 200gr zahar, 3lg cacao
